sentences.en: A long vowel is a long sound as in the word "shoe".
sentences.cn: 长元音即如“shoe”一词中的长音。

sentences.en: A long vowel is a long sound as in the word'shoe ".
sentences.cn: 长元音即如“shoe ” 一词中的长音.

sentences.en: A syllable that ends in a short vowel is a light syllable.
sentences.cn: 以短元音结尾的音节是轻音节.

sentences.en: A vowel can form a syllable by itself.
Affection to initial from vowel is ont of them.
sentences.cn: 韵母中的元音对声母系统演变的影响是其表现之一.

sentences.en: Also, all vowel and diphthong sounds in English are voiced.
sentences.cn: 同样地，所有英语元音和双元音都是发声的。

sentences.en: Always end the name of your child with a vowel, so that when you yell the name will carry.
sentences.cn: 一定让孩子的名字以元音结尾，这样当你喊叫时，这样的名字会助你一臂之力。

sentences.en: An orinasal speech sound , such as a French nasal vowel.
sentences.cn: 在德语中这个元音双重元音化了.

sentences.en: But he could say vowel clearly and began to learn vocabulary.
sentences.cn: 但是他已经能清楚地说元音并开始学习词汇。

sentences.en: Designating the vowel a as pronounced in bad or cat.
Diaresis: Two dots over a vowel to indicate stress.
sentences.cn: 分音符号: 在音字母上的两点,表示加重音调.

sentences.en: Each language has a different vowel system.
sentences.cn: 每种语言都有不同的元音系统。

sentences.en: For adjectives that end in a vowel + consonant we double the consonant.
sentences.cn: 元音+辅音结尾的形容词双写辅音.

sentences.en: Note the use of the vowel sound in should and must when they are pronounced quickly.
sentences.cn: 注意should和must中快速发音时元音的发音.

sentences.en: She asked me to pronounce each vowel and consonant clearly.
sentences.cn: 她叫我把每个元音和辅音都清晰地发出来.

sentences.en: The vowel in words like 'my' and 'thigh' is not very difficult.
sentences.cn: 单词my和thigh中的元音并不难发。

sentences.en: The vowel in words like "my" and "thigh" is not very difficult.
sentences.cn: 单词my和thigh中的元音并不难发。

sentences.en: Towards the end of Middle English, a sudden and distinct change in pronunciation (the Great Vowel Shift) started, with vowels being pronounced shorter and shorter.
sentences.cn: 随着中世纪英语的泯灭，发音突然发生了很大的变化（元音大推移），元音的发音越来越短。

sentences.en: Y is sometimes a vowel, as in bicycle.
sentences.cn: Y有时是元音字母, 如在单字bicycle中.

trans.tran_en: one of the human speech sounds that you make by letting your breath flow out without closing any part of your mouth or throat
one of the human speech sounds that you make by letting your breath flow out without closing any part of your mouth or throat
